text: Johnny Tiger is a 1966 American western movie directed by Paul Wendkos and was based on the story by R. John Hugh. It stars Robert Taylor, Geraldine Brooks, Chad Everett, Brenda Scott, Marc Lawrence, Ford Rainey and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Wendkos Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Florida
title: Johnny Tiger
